entry.title: Our recent paper X-ray PoseNet got accepted at WACV Conference, Santa Rose, CA, USA
entry.summary: Our recent paper, X-ray PoseNet, got accepted at IEEE Winter Application in Computer Vision Conference. In this paper, we introduce the reconstruction loss in addition to the pose loss to further improve the reconstruction quality details
entry.content: Our recent paper, X-ray PoseNet, got accepted at IEEE Winter Application in Computer Vision Conference. In this paper, we introduce the reconstruction loss in addition to the pose loss to further improve the reconstruction quality details
